name: Certificate of Graduate Study in Business

Certificate of Graduate Study in Busines: Certificate of Graduate Study in Business The Business Certificate of Graduate Study (COGS) provides graduate course exposure to students who are ultimately interested in pursuing the MBA degree. There are many potential graduate students who are considering the MBA degree. The purpose of the COGS in Business is to serve as a mini-MBA for those that wish to gain business expertise for career purposes, as well as an opportunity for aspirational applicants to take several classes before they apply to the MBA Program.
